info:
A “Cuisenaire rods” program.

Cuisenaire rods are colored pieces of wood (initially) used as concrete representations of numbers.
coder:
white = + % White Cuisenaire rod (number one)
red = ++ % Red Cuisenaire rod (number two)
lightgreen = +++ % Light green Cuisenaire rod (number three)
purple = ++++ % Purple Cuisenaire rod (number four)
yellow = +++++ % Yellow Cuisenaire rod (number five)
darkgreen = ++++++ % Dark green Cuisenaire rod (number six)
black = +++++++ % Black Cuisenaire rod (number seven)
brown = ++++++++ % Brown Cuisenaire rod (number eight)
blue = +++++++++ % Blue Cuisenaire rod (number nine)
orange = ++++++++++ % Orange Cuisenaire rod (number ten)
previous(X | white) = X
follows(X) = X | white
solve(X | Y, X) = Y
twice (X | +) = twice (X) | ++
twice (+) = ++
